neighbors.name: New Hope Chapel Trustees Of
neighbors.claims: New Hope Chapel Baptist Church is a small congregation located at 3194 Cartersville Highway (US-411) in Rome, Georgia, near the Floyd/Bartow county line [New Hope Chapel Baptist Church](https://newhopechapelbaptistchurches.com/). The church was founded in April 1997 by its current senior pastor, Dr. Drew Brown, who established the ministry and leads it with an evangelistic mission to spread the faith as widely as possible [New Hope Chapel Baptist Church](https://newhopechapelbaptistchurches.com/). The church emphasizes youth ministry and community outreach, with its leadership focused on engaging the local community and bringing "lost and broken souls" to Christianity rather than on political or development issues [New Hope Chapel Baptist Church](https://newhopechapelbaptistchurches.com/).
neighbors.influence_justification: Small congregation; single church property; no known political or economic influence in the area

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage founding pastor Dr. Drew Brown in a respectful dialogue to understand any concerns. Emphasize the project’s positive community impact and ensure it will not disrupt the church’s activities or peaceful environment, aligning with the church’s values of community and outreach.

overview_summary: The identified entity is a small local church holding land in trust. New Hope Chapel Baptist Church is a religious organization led by a longtime pastor and focused on ministry, with limited financial or political influence and no evident stance on development in Floyd County.
